Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored a 27-foot step-back triple in the final period
Brandon Miller called game with a tip shot after Grant Williams missed a game-winning 3-pointer
Post-Match Reflections: The Hornets are playing better than expected and could lay the ground for more competitive seasons
Others: LaMelo Ball finished the first quarter with four points in six minutes
The Hornets took the lead of the game, 46-45 at halftime
The second half was as competitive as they come
The Hornets ended the third quarter up 77-76
